"私と組んでみないかい？":
"Hiya! It seems like you're always running
here and there on quests. Are you
making any progress?

I'm looking for someone to accept a
request right now. Would you like to
be a candidate? But before I team
with you, you're going to be tested.
※Completa la mision en calquier dificultad

"クロトのパートナーカード"
